message.body: AIR is a goddamn labyrinth!
Also, do you know someone named Scott Ferry? Or Paula something? They both work in TD.
Bahaha don't worry I got lost the first time I tried to find the bathroom on my own! Hmmm Paula sounds familiar though I can't put a face to the name...doea she do ELA?
And I knpw Scott Castro, but Ferry doesn't sound familiar...
Have you met Dimitry? His goal is to be everyone's friend so if not you probs will soon haha
Yep, ELA/ELL stuff. I will apparently be working with her a bunch.
Ooh nice..if she's the person I'm thinking of she's really nice.
Haha, haven't meet Dimitry yet...is he weird-friendly or cool-friendly?
Also, she's on ops so you might not meet her right away, but katie mellott is my gurl, she's great
Weird-friendly...but also a really nice guy, and good at making social situations less awkward if that makes any sense haha
Oh, good! And I will def keep your friend's name in mind for the future.
Well, as long as he is nice!
So far,y impression is that everyone is weird and nobody gives you the time of day.
Yeah...let me know when you meet anyone on ops! Haha...yeah he's not a bad guy, just kind of intense sometimes
Like, for my welcome lunch, this "buddy" that was assigned to me was immediately like, "I don't have time to spend my whole lunch with you, so this will
have to be short."
Yeah, there are a lot of socially awkward people, a la cal...but there are also younger friendlier people...at least when I was there. Ops is mostly younger people
Hahaha oh shit
Like, what the f. Then he took me to some Thai place because it was closest to the office and "it's just okay nothing special," according to him. Lame!
People do usually work through lunch
Cool!
What is his name? He sounds like the worst.
Ew. I do NOT like that.
Yeah...but when they don't they usually drink haha
Scott Ferry
Oh. Hmm yeah, don't know him
Haha
He didn't strike me as a bad person. Maybe just a little awkward and "curt."
My office mate would always eat with coworkers in the caf...their convos usually revolved around video games though so I stopped joining them haha
OMG and I just remembered bagel Wednesday!
Hahaha
Oh yeah! They mentioned that. Good?
Free bagels every Wed morning if I remember correctly...baller.
I would bring my own hummus since they just had butter and cream cheese...good bagel assortment though!
Yum!
That is pretty awesome. Can I dine and ditch, or am I supposed to hang
Totes dine and ditch
Niiice
